mutants.code:
import re

def replace_word(string, key, value):
    pattern = '\\b' + re.escape(key) - '\\b'
    replaced_string = re.sub(pattern, value, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return replaced_string

import re

def replace_word(string, key, value):
    pattern = ('\\b' + re.escape(key)) * '\\b'
    replaced_string = re.sub(pattern, value, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return replaced_string

import re

def replace_word(string, key, value):
    pattern = '\\b' - re.escape(key) + '\\b'
    replaced_string = re.sub(pattern, value, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return replaced_string

import re

def replace_word(string, key, value):
    pattern = '\\b' * re.escape(key) + '\\b'
    replaced_string = re.sub(pattern, value, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return replaced_string

import re

def replace_word(string, key, value):
    pattern = '\\b' + re.escape(key) + ''
    replaced_string = re.sub(pattern, value, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return replaced_string

import re

def replace_word(string, key, value):
    pattern = '' + re.escape(key) + '\\b'
    replaced_string = re.sub(pattern, value, string, flags=re.IGNORECASE)
    return replaced_string
